body:
#### PR description:

This PR extends the cmsRun argument parsing tests with what I commented in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42650#issuecomment-1747471112 .

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/695

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Add more tests for cmsRun argument parsing
